channel.title: Grace's personal website
channel.description: Recent content on Grace's personal website

item.title: About me
item.description: Introduction: My name is Grace, I was born on the 30th of November. I am interested in coding. Therefore, I have learn quite a few coding languages, such as python, Java and Scratch. I have done a 1 week course of Java in First code academy. My Family: My Mom is born in Hong Kong and my dad is born in Korea. I am able to speak quite a lot of languages, such as: English, Cantonese, Mandarin, Korean.
